languages.text: {n}"В служители смерти!" — вторят вам шепоты храма, и Висирь с почтением склоняет голову.{/n} "Кровью флагмана стал{mf||а} ты. Теперь же станешь одн{mf|им|ой} из слуг Его верных — пусть ткачом не можем тебя наречь, ибо путь его требует отказа от жизни прежней, но Кровавая паутина примет тебя. Лишь для Домин, что прош{mf|ел|ла} по Дороге кровавых следов, Завет дозволяет сие".

traits.locale_text: {n}"В служители смерти!" — вторят вам шепоты храма, и Висирь с почтением склоняет голову.{/n} "Кровью флагмана стал{mf||а} ты. Теперь же станешь одн{mf|им|ой} из слуг Его верных — пусть ткачом не можем тебя наречь, ибо путь его требует отказа от жизни прежней, но Кровавая паутина примет тебя. Лишь для Домин, что прош{mf|ел|прошла} по Дороге кровавых следов, Завет дозволяет сие".

languages.text: {n}"A servant of death!" hiss the echoing whispers from the temple, and the Vizsier bows his head reverently.{/n} "You have become the blood of the flagship. Now you will become one of His faithful servants. We may not name you a spinner, for a spinner's thread demands the forsaking of one's previous life, but the Bloodspun Web will still accept you. The Tenets allow it, but only for a Domin who has followed the trailing blood until the end."
languages.original_text: {n}"В служители смерти!" — вторят вам шепоты храма, и Висирь с почтением склоняет голову.{/n} "Кровью флагмана стал{mf||а} ты. Теперь же станешь одн{mf|им|ой} из слуг Его верных — пусть ткачом не можем тебя наречь, ибо путь его требует отказа от жизни прежней, но Кровавая паутина примет тебя. Лишь для Домин, что прош{mf|ел|ла} по Дороге кровавых следов, Завет дозволяет сие".

traits.locale_text: {n}"A servant of death!" hiss the echoing whispers from the temple, and the Vizsier bows his head reverently.{/n} "You have become the blood of the flagship. Now you will become one of His faithful servants. We may not name you a spinner, for a spinner's thread demands to forsake the life of one's past, but the Bloodspun Web will still accept you. The Tenets allow it, but only for a Domin who has followed the trailing blood until the end."

"A servant of death!" {n}say the echoing whispers from the temple, and the Vizsier bows his head reverently.{/n} "You have become the blood of the flagship. Now you will become one of His faithful servants; now you will serve Death."

Now you will become one of His faithful servants. We may not name you a spinner, for a spinner's thread demands the forsaking of one's previous life, but the Bloodspun Web will still accept you. The Tenets allow it, but only for a Domin who has followed the trailing blood until the end."

Now you will become one of His faithful servants. We may not name you a spinner, for a spinner's thread demands the forsaking of one's previous life, but the Bloodspun Web will still accept you. The Tenets allow it, but only for a Domin who has followed the trailing blood until the end."

languages.text: {n}"{mf|Ein Diener|Eine Dienerin} des Todes!", zischt das Echo der flüsternden Stimmen im Tempel, und der Wesir neigt ehrfürchtig den Kopf.{/n} "Ihr seid zum Blut des Flaggschiffs geworden. Nun werdet Ihr zu {mf|Seinem treuen Diener|Seiner treuen Dienerin} werden. Wir ernennen Euch nicht {mf|zum Spinner|zur Spinnerin}, denn das Netz eines Spinners verlangt die Abkehr von seinem bisherigen Leben, aber dennoch wird Euch das Blutgesponnene Netz akzeptieren. Die Grundsätze gestatten es, allerdings nur für {mf|einen|eine} Domin, {mf|der|die} der Blutspur bis zum Ende gefolgt ist."
languages.original_text: {n}"A servant of death!" hiss the echoing whispers from the temple, and the Vizsier bows his head reverently.{/n} "You have become the blood of the flagship. Now you will become one of His faithful servants. We may not name you a spinner, for a spinner's thread demands the forsaking of one's previous life, but the Bloodspun Web will still accept you. The Tenets allow it, but only for a Domin who has followed the trailing blood until the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}"{mf|Ein Diener|Eine Dienerin} des Todes!", zischt der Hall der flüsternden Stimmen im Tempel, und der Wesir neigt ehrfürchtig den Kopf.{/n} "Ihr seid zum Blut des Flaggschiffs geworden. Nun werdet Ihr zu {mf|seinem treuen Diener|seiner treuen Dienerin} werden. Nun werdet Ihr dem Tod dienen."

languages.text: {n}Los susurros del templo repiten «¡Sirvient{mf|e|a} de la muerte!», y el Visir baja la cabeza en señal de respeto.{/n} «Se ha convertido en la sangre de la nave insignia. Ahora será un{mf|o|a} de Sus fieles sirvient{mf|e|a}s. Puede que no se le nombre tejedor{mf||a}, pues el hilo de un{mf|o|a} de ell{mf|o|a}s requiere que otr{mf|o|a} muera, pero la Red Sanguinolenta le ampara. La Doctrina lo permite, pero solo si se trata de un{mf||a} Domin que haya seguido el rastro de sangre hasta el final».
languages.original_text: {n}"A servant of death!" hiss the echoing whispers from the temple, and the Vizsier bows his head reverently.{/n} "You have become the blood of the flagship. Now you will become one of His faithful servants. We may not name you a spinner, for a spinner's thread demands the forsaking of one's previous life, but the Bloodspun Web will still accept you. The Tenets allow it, but only for a Domin who has followed the trailing blood until the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los susurros del templo repiten «¡Sirvient{mf|e|a} de la muerte!», y el Visir baja la cabeza en señal de respeto.{/n} «Se ha convertido en la sangre de la nave insignia. Ahora será un{mf|o|a} de Sus fieles sirvient{mf|e|a}s. Ahora servirá a la muerte».

languages.text: {n}「死のしもべだ！」神殿から響くささやき声に、ヴィジールは恭しく頭を下げた。{/n}「あなたは旗艦の血となった。今、あなたはあのお方の忠実な僕となる。我々はあなたを織り手とは呼べない。なぜなら、織り手の糸はそれまでの人生を捨てることを求めるからです。 しかし、ブラッドスパン・ウェブはあなたのことを受け入れます。信条がそれを認めますが、それは血の跡を辿り続けたドミンだけに許されることです」
languages.original_text: {n}"A servant of death!" hiss the echoing whispers from the temple, and the Vizsier bows his head reverently.{/n} "You have become the blood of the flagship. Now you will become one of His faithful servants. We may not name you a spinner, for a spinner's thread demands the forsaking of one's previous life, but the Bloodspun Web will still accept you. The Tenets allow it, but only for a Domin who has followed the trailing blood until the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}「死の従者！」神殿から響いてくるささやきに、ヴィジールは恭しく頭を下げる。{/n}「あなたは旗艦の血となった。あなたは主の忠実な従者となる。さあ、死に仕えるのだ」

languages.text: {n}“死亡的仆人！”圣殿里传来了低语声。宿老恭恭敬敬地低下了头。{/n}“您已经成为了旗舰的血脉，如今，您要成为祂忠诚的仆人。我们可能不会称呼您为织网者，因为只有放弃前世的人才能成为织网者，但织血罗网依然会接纳您。根据教义规定，尽管织血罗网可以破例接受织网者之外的成员，但只有沿着圣血之路走到终点的秘者才能享有这样的特权。”
languages.original_text: {n}"A servant of death!" hiss the echoing whispers from the temple, and the Vizsier bows his head reverently.{/n} "You have become the blood of the flagship. Now you will become one of His faithful servants. We may not name you a spinner, for a spinner's thread demands the forsaking of one's previous life, but the Bloodspun Web will still accept you. The Tenets allow it, but only for a Domin who has followed the trailing blood until the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}“死亡的仆人！”圣殿里传来了低语声。宿老恭恭敬敬地低下了头。{/n}“您已经成为了旗舰的血脉，而如今，您要成为祂忠诚的仆人。从此刻起，您将侍奉死亡。”

languages.text: {n}« {mf|Un serviteur|Une servante} de la mort ! » sifflent en écho les murmures émanant du temple, et le vizir baisse révérencieusement la tête.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|devenu|devenue} le sang du vaisseau amiral, et vous allez à présent intégrer les rangs de Ses fidèles serviteurs. Si nous ne pouvons vous compter parmi les tisseurs, qui doivent renoncer à leur existence précédente, la Toile de Sang vous accepte tout de même. Les Préceptes le permettent, mais uniquement pour les Domini qui ont suivi la piste de sang jusqu'au bout. »
languages.original_text: {n}"A servant of death!" hiss the echoing whispers from the temple, and the Vizsier bows his head reverently.{/n} "You have become the blood of the flagship. Now you will become one of His faithful servants. We may not name you a spinner, for a spinner's thread demands the forsaking of one's previous life, but the Bloodspun Web will still accept you. The Tenets allow it, but only for a Domin who has followed the trailing blood until the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}« {mf|Un serviteur|Une servante} de la mort ! » sifflent en écho les murmures émanant du temple, et le vizir baisse révérencieusement la tête.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|devenu|devenue} le sang du vaisseau amiral, et vous allez à présent intégrer les rangs de Ses fidèles serviteurs. Dorénavant, c'est la mort que vous servirez. »

languages.text: {n}Tapınaktan yankılanan fısıltılar, "Ölümün hizmetkârı!" diye tıslıyor. Ardından Vezir, hürmetkâr bir şekilde başını eğiyor.{/n} "Sancak gemisinin kanına dönüştünüz. Artık O'nun inançlı hizmetkârlarından olacaksınız. Size dokur ünvanını bahşedemeyebiliriz çünkü bir dokurun ipliği, kişinin önceki yaşamını geride bırakmasını emreder. Yine de Kanipi Ağı sizi kabul edecek. İlkeler buna izin veriyor. Ancak bu, yalnızca kan izini sonuna dek takip eden Dominler için geçerli."
languages.original_text: {n}"A servant of death!" hiss the echoing whispers from the temple, and the Vizsier bows his head reverently.{/n} "You have become the blood of the flagship. Now you will become one of His faithful servants. We may not name you a spinner, for a spinner's thread demands the forsaking of one's previous life, but the Bloodspun Web will still accept you. The Tenets allow it, but only for a Domin who has followed the trailing blood until the end."
